descriptionHtml: Why choosing my mod except of entering command that give full of CC? well the answers is simple, because with my mod, you still can achieve steam\'s achievement, so using my mods won\'t penalise you. for what this mod do, i think everything is in the name..... there\'s only a but.... i don\'t know why in the hell bethesda have changed the way of the base carrying capacity but now it work on each race, so this mods won\'t work with a modded race/child/old because i\'ve just changed it on official playable race. And, because it change something that is setted from the begining, i\'m not sure if it will work on an existing save game it may even broke it, so make a back-up before testing.
author: Kevin
